title: Entertainment hub
about: The purpose of our application is to merge two seperate API's (Application Program Interface) so the user can have access to detailed information, from the movie/tv show down to the very album information that is present within the movie. We took this concept and utilized the Spotify API and Movie/TV Show DB API to interact with each in our code. The goal was to display the data from each individual API through the users click interaction.

title: Weather Dashboard
about: This application uses Ajax calls to a OpenWeather API to display current weather and 5-day forecast for cities around the world that are searchable by user.

title: Polite Mail
about: Create an interactive site that allows users to choose a variety of badly worded (but honest) phrases, and turn it into a more appropriate email.

title: Sum it up
about: Create an interactive site that allows users to input large amounts of text and receive a simplified, summarized version of that text for quicker reading and study purposes.
